segments.text: I am looking into a kitchen scene, a line drawing in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lighting suggests it is daytime, casting a gentle glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see three figures: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen appears fairly standard, with cabinets and a sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is immediately drawn to the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actively running from the faucet, and the basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To my surprise, the water is overflowing the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring onto the cabinet doors and forming a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands directly in front of this cascading water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is drying a plate with a dish towel, utterly focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice one of her feet is already submerged in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite shocking that she shows absolutely no reaction to the flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains entirely neutral, which is perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR
